Description: Magical gem; intaglio; moss agate; oval; bevelled edge; engraved on oberse: lizard; letters in field; inscription on reverse.
Bibliographic references: Michel 2001 / Die Magischen Gemmen im Britischen Museum (424)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2015, Oct 29 – 2016, Feb 7. British Museum, Room 35. Egypt: Faith after the Pharoahs
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Rev Greville John Chester
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: G230 (Burns Gnostic Gem Number)
Other BM number: OA.9716 (Registration number and/or Big number reinstated in 2023)
